00061 #if (ACMP_COUNT == 1)
00062 #define ACMP_REF_VALID(ref)    ((ref) == ACMP0)
00063 #elif (ACMP_COUNT == 2)
00064 #define ACMP_REF_VALID(ref)    (((ref) == ACMP0) || ((ref) == ACMP1))
00065 #else
00066 #error Undefined number of analog comparators (ACMP).
00067 #endif

00079 #else

00089 /***************************************************************************/
00110 void ACMP_CapsenseInit(ACMP_TypeDef *acmp, const ACMP_CapsenseInit_TypeDef *init)
00111 {
00112   /* Make sure the module exists on the selected chip */
00113   EFM_ASSERT(ACMP_REF_VALID(acmp));
00114 
00115   /* Make sure that vddLevel is within bounds */
00116 #if defined(_ACMP_INPUTSEL_VDDLEVEL_MASK)
00117   EFM_ASSERT(init->vddLevel < 64);
00118 #else
00119   EFM_ASSERT(init->vddLevelLow < 64);
00120   EFM_ASSERT(init->vddLevelHigh < 64);
00121 #endif
00122 
00123   /* Make sure biasprog is within bounds */
00124   EFM_ASSERT(init->biasProg <=
00125       (_ACMP_CTRL_BIASPROG_MASK >> _ACMP_CTRL_BIASPROG_SHIFT));
00126 
00127   /* Set control register. No need to set interrupt modes */
00128   acmp->CTRL = (init->fullBias << _ACMP_CTRL_FULLBIAS_SHIFT)
00129 #if defined(_ACMP_CTRL_HALFBIAS_MASK)
00130                | (init->halfBias << _ACMP_CTRL_HALFBIAS_SHIFT)
00131 #endif
00132                | (init->biasProg << _ACMP_CTRL_BIASPROG_SHIFT)
00133 #if defined(_ACMP_CTRL_WARMTIME_MASK)
00134                | (init->warmTime << _ACMP_CTRL_WARMTIME_SHIFT)
00135 #endif
00136 #if defined(_ACMP_CTRL_HYSTSEL_MASK)
00137                | (init->hysteresisLevel << _ACMP_CTRL_HYSTSEL_SHIFT)
00138 #endif
00139 #if defined(_ACMP_CTRL_ACCURACY_MASK)
00140                | ACMP_CTRL_ACCURACY_HIGH
00141 #endif
00142                ;
00143 
00144 #if defined(_ACMP_HYSTERESIS0_MASK)
00145   acmp->HYSTERESIS0 = (init->vddLevelHigh      << _ACMP_HYSTERESIS0_DIVVA_SHIFT)
00146                       | (init->hysteresisLevel_0 << _ACMP_HYSTERESIS0_HYST_SHIFT);
00147   acmp->HYSTERESIS1 = (init->vddLevelLow       << _ACMP_HYSTERESIS1_DIVVA_SHIFT)
00148                       | (init->hysteresisLevel_1 << _ACMP_HYSTERESIS1_HYST_SHIFT);
00149 #endif
00150 
00151   /* Select capacative sensing mode by selecting a resistor and enabling it */
00152   acmp->INPUTSEL = (init->resistor << _ACMP_INPUTSEL_CSRESSEL_SHIFT)
00153                    | ACMP_INPUTSEL_CSRESEN
00154 #if defined(_ACMP_INPUTSEL_LPREF_MASK)
00155                    | (init->lowPowerReferenceEnabled << _ACMP_INPUTSEL_LPREF_SHIFT)
00156 #endif
00157 #if defined(_ACMP_INPUTSEL_VDDLEVEL_MASK)
00158                    | (init->vddLevel << _ACMP_INPUTSEL_VDDLEVEL_SHIFT)
00159 #endif
00160 #if defined(ACMP_INPUTSEL_NEGSEL_CAPSENSE)
00161                    | ACMP_INPUTSEL_NEGSEL_CAPSENSE
00162 #else
00163                    | ACMP_INPUTSEL_VASEL_VDD
00164                    | ACMP_INPUTSEL_NEGSEL_VADIV
00165 #endif
00166                    ;
00167 
00168   /* Enable ACMP if requested. */
00169   BUS_RegBitWrite(&(acmp->CTRL), _ACMP_CTRL_EN_SHIFT, init->enable);
00170 }

00172 /***************************************************************************/
00186 void ACMP_CapsenseChannelSet(ACMP_TypeDef *acmp, ACMP_Channel_TypeDef channel)
00187 {
00188   /* Make sure the module exists on the selected chip */
00189   EFM_ASSERT(ACMP_REF_VALID(acmp));
00190 
00191 #if defined(_ACMP_INPUTSEL_POSSEL_CH7)
00192   /* Make sure that only external channels are used */
00193   EFM_ASSERT(channel <= _ACMP_INPUTSEL_POSSEL_CH7);
00194 #elif defined(_ACMP_INPUTSEL_POSSEL_BUS4XCH31)
00195   /* Make sure that only external channels are used */
00196   EFM_ASSERT(channel <= _ACMP_INPUTSEL_POSSEL_BUS4XCH31);
00197 #endif
00198 
00199   /* Set channel as positive channel in ACMP */
00200   BUS_RegMaskedWrite(&acmp->INPUTSEL, _ACMP_INPUTSEL_POSSEL_MASK,
00201       channel << _ACMP_INPUTSEL_POSSEL_SHIFT);
00202 }

00211 void ACMP_Disable(ACMP_TypeDef *acmp)
00212 {
00213   /* Make sure the module exists on the selected chip */
00214   EFM_ASSERT(ACMP_REF_VALID(acmp));
00215 
00216   acmp->CTRL &= ~ACMP_CTRL_EN;
00217 }

00219 /***************************************************************************/
00226 void ACMP_Enable(ACMP_TypeDef *acmp)
00227 {
00228   /* Make sure the module exists on the selected chip */
00229   EFM_ASSERT(ACMP_REF_VALID(acmp));
00230 
00231   acmp->CTRL |= ACMP_CTRL_EN;
00232 }
00233 
00234 /***************************************************************************/
00245 void ACMP_Reset(ACMP_TypeDef *acmp)
00246 {
00247   /* Make sure the module exists on the selected chip */
00248   EFM_ASSERT(ACMP_REF_VALID(acmp));
00249 
00250   acmp->CTRL        = _ACMP_CTRL_RESETVALUE;
00251   acmp->INPUTSEL    = _ACMP_INPUTSEL_RESETVALUE;
00252 #if defined(_ACMP_HYSTERESIS0_HYST_MASK)
00253   acmp->HYSTERESIS0 = _ACMP_HYSTERESIS0_RESETVALUE;
00254   acmp->HYSTERESIS1 = _ACMP_HYSTERESIS1_RESETVALUE;
00255 #endif
00256   acmp->IEN         = _ACMP_IEN_RESETVALUE;
00257   acmp->IFC         = _ACMP_IF_MASK;
00258 }
00259 
00260 /***************************************************************************/
00280 void ACMP_GPIOSetup(ACMP_TypeDef *acmp, uint32_t location, bool enable, bool invert)
00281 {
00282   /* Make sure the module exists on the selected chip */
00283   EFM_ASSERT(ACMP_REF_VALID(acmp));
00284 
00285   /* Sanity checking of location */
00286   EFM_ASSERT(location <= _ACMP_ROUTE_LOCATION_MAX);
00287 
00288   /* Set GPIO inversion */
00289   BUS_RegMaskedWrite(&acmp->CTRL, _ACMP_CTRL_GPIOINV_MASK,
00290       invert << _ACMP_CTRL_GPIOINV_SHIFT);
00291 
00292 #if defined(_ACMP_ROUTE_MASK)
00293   acmp->ROUTE = (location << _ACMP_ROUTE_LOCATION_SHIFT)
00294                 | (enable << _ACMP_ROUTE_ACMPPEN_SHIFT);
00295 #endif
00296 #if defined(_ACMP_ROUTELOC0_MASK)
00297   acmp->ROUTELOC0 = location << _ACMP_ROUTELOC0_OUTLOC_SHIFT;
00298   acmp->ROUTEPEN  = enable ? ACMP_ROUTEPEN_OUTPEN : 0;
00299 #endif
00300 }

00302 /***************************************************************************/
00315 void ACMP_ChannelSet(ACMP_TypeDef *acmp, ACMP_Channel_TypeDef negSel,
00316                      ACMP_Channel_TypeDef posSel)
00317 {
00318   /* Make sure the module exists on the selected chip */
00319   EFM_ASSERT(ACMP_REF_VALID(acmp));
00320 
00321   /* Make sure that posSel and negSel channel selectors are valid. */
00322 #if defined(_ACMP_INPUTSEL_NEGSEL_DAC0CH1)
00323   EFM_ASSERT(negSel <= _ACMP_INPUTSEL_NEGSEL_DAC0CH1);
00324 #elif defined(_ACMP_INPUTSEL_NEGSEL_CAPSENSE)
00325   EFM_ASSERT(negSel <= _ACMP_INPUTSEL_NEGSEL_CAPSENSE);
00326 #endif
00327 
00328 #if defined(_ACMP_INPUTSEL_POSSEL_CH7)
00329   EFM_ASSERT(posSel <= _ACMP_INPUTSEL_POSSEL_CH7);
00330 #endif
00331 
00332   acmp->INPUTSEL = (acmp->INPUTSEL & ~(_ACMP_INPUTSEL_POSSEL_MASK
00333                                        | _ACMP_INPUTSEL_NEGSEL_MASK))
00334                    | (negSel << _ACMP_INPUTSEL_NEGSEL_SHIFT)
00335                    | (posSel << _ACMP_INPUTSEL_POSSEL_SHIFT);
00336 }
00337 
00338 /***************************************************************************/
00349 void ACMP_Init(ACMP_TypeDef *acmp, const ACMP_Init_TypeDef *init)
00350 {
00351   /* Make sure the module exists on the selected chip */
00352   EFM_ASSERT(ACMP_REF_VALID(acmp));
00353 
00354   /* Make sure biasprog is within bounds */
00355   EFM_ASSERT(init->biasProg < 16);
00356 
00357   /* Make sure the ACMP is disable since we might be changing the
00358    * ACMP power source */
00359   BUS_RegBitWrite(&acmp->CTRL, _ACMP_CTRL_EN_SHIFT, 0);
00360 
00361   /* Set control register. No need to set interrupt modes */
00362   acmp->CTRL = (init->fullBias << _ACMP_CTRL_FULLBIAS_SHIFT)
00363 #if defined(_ACMP_CTRL_HALFBIAS_MASK)
00364                | (init->halfBias << _ACMP_CTRL_HALFBIAS_SHIFT)
00365 #endif
00366                | (init->biasProg << _ACMP_CTRL_BIASPROG_SHIFT)
00367                | (init->interruptOnFallingEdge << _ACMP_CTRL_IFALL_SHIFT)
00368                | (init->interruptOnRisingEdge << _ACMP_CTRL_IRISE_SHIFT)
00369 #if defined(_ACMP_CTRL_INPUTRANGE_MASK)
00370                | (init->inputRange << _ACMP_CTRL_INPUTRANGE_SHIFT)
00371 #endif
00372 #if defined(_ACMP_CTRL_ACCURACY_MASK)
00373                | (init->accuracy << _ACMP_CTRL_ACCURACY_SHIFT)
00374 #endif
00375 #if defined(_ACMP_CTRL_PWRSEL_MASK)
00376                | (init->powerSource << _ACMP_CTRL_PWRSEL_SHIFT)
00377 #endif
00378 #if defined(_ACMP_CTRL_WARMTIME_MASK)
00379                | (init->warmTime << _ACMP_CTRL_WARMTIME_SHIFT)
00380 #endif
00381 #if defined(_ACMP_CTRL_REFRESHRATE_MASK)
00382                | (init->refreshRate << _ACMP_CTRL_REFRESHRATE_SHIFT)
00383 #endif
00384 #if defined(_ACMP_CTRL_HYSTSEL_MASK)
00385                | (init->hysteresisLevel << _ACMP_CTRL_HYSTSEL_SHIFT)
00386 #endif
00387                | (init->inactiveValue << _ACMP_CTRL_INACTVAL_SHIFT);
00388 
00389   acmp->INPUTSEL = (0)
00390 #if defined(_ACMP_INPUTSEL_VLPSEL_MASK)
00391                | (init->vlpInput << _ACMP_INPUTSEL_VLPSEL_SHIFT)
00392 #endif
00393 #if defined(_ACMP_INPUTSEL_LPREF_MASK)
00394                | (init->lowPowerReferenceEnabled << _ACMP_INPUTSEL_LPREF_SHIFT)
00395 #endif
00396 #if defined(_ACMP_INPUTSEL_VDDLEVEL_MASK)
00397                | (init->vddLevel << _ACMP_INPUTSEL_VDDLEVEL_SHIFT)
00398 #endif
00399                ;
00400 
00401   /* Enable ACMP if requested. */
00402   BUS_RegBitWrite(&(acmp->CTRL), _ACMP_CTRL_EN_SHIFT, init->enable);
00403 }

00405 #if defined(_ACMP_INPUTSEL_VASEL_MASK)
00406 /***************************************************************************/
00417 void ACMP_VASetup(ACMP_TypeDef *acmp, const ACMP_VAConfig_TypeDef *vaconfig)
00418 {
00419   EFM_ASSERT(vaconfig->div0 < 64);
00420   EFM_ASSERT(vaconfig->div1 < 64);
00421 
00422   BUS_RegMaskedWrite(&acmp->INPUTSEL, _ACMP_INPUTSEL_VASEL_MASK,
00423       vaconfig->input << _ACMP_INPUTSEL_VASEL_SHIFT);
00424   BUS_RegMaskedWrite(&acmp->HYSTERESIS0, _ACMP_HYSTERESIS0_DIVVA_MASK,
00425       vaconfig->div0 << _ACMP_HYSTERESIS0_DIVVA_SHIFT);
00426   BUS_RegMaskedWrite(&acmp->HYSTERESIS1, _ACMP_HYSTERESIS1_DIVVA_MASK,
00427       vaconfig->div1 << _ACMP_HYSTERESIS1_DIVVA_SHIFT);
00428 }
00429 #endif
00430 
00431 #if defined(_ACMP_INPUTSEL_VBSEL_MASK)
00432 /***************************************************************************/
00443 void ACMP_VBSetup(ACMP_TypeDef *acmp, const ACMP_VBConfig_TypeDef *vbconfig)
00444 {
00445   EFM_ASSERT(vbconfig->div0 < 64);
00446   EFM_ASSERT(vbconfig->div1 < 64);
00447 
00448   BUS_RegMaskedWrite(&acmp->INPUTSEL, _ACMP_INPUTSEL_VBSEL_MASK,
00449       vbconfig->input << _ACMP_INPUTSEL_VBSEL_SHIFT);
00450   BUS_RegMaskedWrite(&acmp->HYSTERESIS0, _ACMP_HYSTERESIS0_DIVVB_MASK,
00451       vbconfig->div0 << _ACMP_HYSTERESIS0_DIVVB_SHIFT);
00452   BUS_RegMaskedWrite(&acmp->HYSTERESIS1, _ACMP_HYSTERESIS1_DIVVB_MASK,
00453       vbconfig->div1 << _ACMP_HYSTERESIS1_DIVVB_SHIFT);
00454 }
